did.unittitle: Collection of large format negatives of buildings in Brooklyn
did.abstract: The collection primarily documents domestic architecture in Brooklyn from 1840-1920; there are also views of churches, a firehouse headquarters, and the gates at Green-Wood Cemetery.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Collection of large format negatives of buildings in Brooklyn consist of 19 8 x 10 inch black-and-white negatives, circa 1840 to 1920. Though the collection primarily documents domestic architecture in Brooklyn, there are also views of churches, a firehouse headquarters, and the gates at Green-Wood Cemetery.
